0110110011101010 1100110111101000 1 -> sum: 0011101011010011, cout: 1

0100101001100100 1001101110111011 1 -> sum: 1110011000100000, cout: 0
1100000110110001 1101100111110101 1 -> sum: 1001101110100111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
